<!-- tab "panes" --><div class="ut-tab-content entry-content clearfix"><div class="tab-pane active  clearfix" id="t2Tab">
<strong>High Speed Internet Access</strong></p>
<div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom  " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-rocket"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>HiPERFIBER</h3><p>Fiber-based services up to 1gbps, available in 15+ HDT on-net buildings.<br />
</p></div></div> </p>
<div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom  " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-fighter-jet"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>Fixed Wireless</h3><p> For customers in hard-to-reach areas or where their requirements for capacity exceed what wireline can deliver, we provide Ethernet based services up to 1gbps with path redundancy.</p></div></div>
<div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom ut-column-last " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-bolt"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>EFM</h3><p> Ethernet in the First Mile (EFM) is a solution for customers who need a cost-effective, high-speed symmetrical Internet connection. </p></div></div>
</div>
<div class="tab-pane   clearfix" id="t1Tab">
<strong>Hosted Voice Services</strong></p>
<div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom  " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-road"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>Accession Communicator</h3><p> Apps on iOS, Android, Windows and OSX allow commercial customers to extend their business communications platform whether hosted, SIP or traditional to any device connected to the Internet. <a href="http://kz5p3312g93118w3e3rkkakh.wpengine.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/accession_onesheet.pdf" target="_blank">Read more about the Accession Communicator service.</a> </p></div></div>
<div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom  " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-cogs"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>Hosted Voice</h3><p> Allows companies to gain the features of a large expensive phone system without having to install or maintain one. <a href="http://kz5p3312g93118w3e3rkkakh.wpengine.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/hosted_voice_onesheet.pdf" target="_blank">Read more about our Hosted Voice service.</a><span class="highVAL"><i> </i></span></p></div></div>
<div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom ut-column-last " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-globe"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>SIP Trunking</h3><p> A new and efficient way to connect your phone system to the public telephone network using an IP-based network. Via network consolidation, enterprise customers can save a substantial amount of upfront capital and monthly recurring costs. </p></div></div>
<p><div class="clear"></div><div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom  " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-phone"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>Traditional Services</h3><p> This includes services such as ISDN PRI and analog B1 lines. Our traditional services are enhanced with the integration of newer features allowing customers to continue leveraging their investment in legacy infrastructure while increasing productivity and capability.</p></div></div>
</div>
<div class="tab-pane   clearfix" id="t4Tab">
<strong>MANAGED SECURITY-HDT DEFENSE</strong></p>
<div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom ut-column-last " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-shield"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>Defense Fundamental</h3><p>
<ul class="fa-ul" style="margin-left:20px">
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Firewall Appliance  hosted in <br />FiberHDT  Cloud</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>NAT</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Port Forwarding</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>DHCP</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>DNS</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Blacklist IP Filtering</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Dynamic DNS</li>
</ul>
</p></div></div>
<div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom  " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-lock"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>Defense Premier</h3><p>
<ul class="fa-ul" style="margin-left:20px">
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Hosted on FiberHDT   Palo Alto 5000   Cluster</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Basic Firewall   (NAT, DNS, DHCP)</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Intrusion Protection</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Antivirus</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Web Content Filtering</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Spam Filtering</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Up to 25 VPN Clients</li>
</ul>
</p></div></div> </p>
<div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom  " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-user-secret"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>Defense Clean Pipe</h3><p>
<ul class="fa-ul" style="margin-left:20px">
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Anti-DDOS</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Intrusion Prevention</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Advanced Threat  Protection</li>
<li><i class="fa-li fa">–</i>Transparent to  Customers</li>
</ul>
</p></div></div>
</div>
<div class="tab-pane   clearfix" id="t5Tab">
<strong>Cloud Services</strong></p>
<div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom  " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-cl"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>Cloud Services</h3><p>Virtual Machines, Smart Servers or BareMetal running on the latest generation Cisco UCS (M4) or HP Proliant (G8) blade servers. Bundle your cloud compute resources with our network transport and save on floor space, electrical and cooling .</p></div></div>
</div>
<div class="tab-pane   clearfix" id="t3Tab">
<strong>Data Networking</strong></p>
<div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom  " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-stack-overflow"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>MPLS Carrier Ethernet Services</h3><p> For customers that require more advanced data networking services, we offer best-in-class networking solutions based on Cisco networking platforms. These services include MPLS VPN, VPLS, and TDM over Ethernet and other related services.</p></div></div> </p>
<div  class="ut-one-third add-bottom ut-column-last " ><figure class="ut-service-icon "><i style="color: #85a837" class="fa fa-laptop"></i></figure><div class="ut-service-column" ><h3>Co-location Services</h3><p>Lease dedicated space to host your physical servers, routers and other computing hardware housed in either of two HDT facilities. HDT co-location products include 120 Volt/20 amp power with one primary and one redundant power circuit.</p></div></div>  </p>

<!-- tab "panes" --><div class="ut-tab-content entry-content clearfix"><div class="tab-pane active  clearfix" id="t100Tab"> HDT wholesale services are targeted at communications operators such as CLECs, MSOs and ISPs seeking to cost effectively add Internet and VoIP products to their portfolio. Our wholesale services successfully integrate into existing operational and administrative systems.</p>
<p>Our wholesale product suite includes a complete range of telephony features, a nationwide footprint, FCC-compliant E911, conferencing, training and other support features. The core VoIP application services are sold on a ‘per seat’ basis, with term commitments. Additional services are available a la carte including voice origination and termination services with E911 and toll-free, audio/web conferencing, CPE procurement, field services, and more.</p>
<p>Whether you are seeking to add new customers, generate incremental revenue streams from existing customers or improve customer retention, our wholesale service can help you profitably achieve your goals. </div>
<div class="tab-pane   clearfix" id="t102Tab"> HDT’s private label services are designed for organizations such as VARs, ASPs, ISPs, SAAS providers, system integrators, and those that prefer to focus on selling services rather than managing the operational details of the service delivery model. The easy-to-rebrand solution is sold on a per seat or service basis with prices dependent on services, volume and term.</p>
<p>At the heart of the product suite are telephony packages targeted at different business end-users including executives, remote workers, sales personnel and receptionists. These packages can be utilized by channel partners to create bundles appropriate for your own select target markets, whether offering hosted solutions, trunk-based solutions or both. </div>
<div class="tab-pane   clearfix" id="t103Tab"><strong></strong><strong>Private label features include:</strong></p>

                                    <p><strong>Corporate Overview</strong></p>
<p>Hawaii Dialogix Telecom (HDT) is a privately held internet service provider and licensed facilities-based competitive local exchange carrier (CLEC) headquartered in Honolulu, Hawaii.  Services are provided on HDT-owned network infrastructure, which includes dedicated Internet access, private networking and data transport services, local and long distance voice as well as bundled voice and Internet solutions.</p>
<p>We provide service to all sizes of business customers from your corner restaurant to Hawaii’s largest corporations.   We also provide bulk service arrangements to large, multi-tenant commercial and residential high-rise buildings, complexes and communities.  Additionally, we work with resellers who want to deliver a highly effective and comprehensive service offering to their customers.</p>
